    public class SimpleTagSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleTag
    Define tag handlers implementing Simpletag.

      • doTag

        public void doTag()
           throws JspException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Default processing of the tag (does nothing).
        Specified by:
        doTag in interface SimpleTag
        Throws:
        JspException - error while processing the page.
        SkipPageException - if the page invoked this tag is no more evaluated.
        java.io.IOException - error while writing to the output stream.
        JspException - error while processing this tag.
        See Also:
        SimpleTag.doTag()

      • findAncestorWithClass

        public static final JspTag findAncestorWithClass(JspTag from,
                           java.lang.Class<?> klass)
        Find the instance of a given class type that is closest to a given instance. This method uses the getParent method from Tag and/ or SimpleTag interfaces.
        Parameters:
        from - the instance from where to start looking
        klass - the subclass of JspTag or interface to be matched.
        Returns:
        the nearest ancestor that implements the interface or is an instance of the class specified.
